title: Inventory count
empty_desc: History will show when products are added or removed (write-off, mobile inventory).

write_off.title: Write off product
write_off.success: Changes saved. All changes are recorded in Audit log (stock_movement) with full detail.
write_off.no_locations_for_product: No stock locations for this product.

opening_balance.title: Bulk opening balance
opening_balance.description: Set the same opening balance quantity for all active products at the selected location. You can adjust later via inventory count.
opening_balance.validation: Select a location and enter quantity (greater than 0).
